group.title: Non technical
points: Quick learner with a genuine interest in solving problems, and lateral thinking.
Excellent and effective communicator inside and outside of the workplace.
Intense interest in technological systems, and how they can be used to empower people and create information.
Disciplined team player and dedicated to self improvement and growth

group.title: Frontend
points: Angular, React and supporting libraries such as mateirla design, bootstrap, ng-flex, moment, lodash etc
Rxjs stream based approach to architecture and module communication
Redux, ngrx, mobx, ngxs as a state orgranisation or MVC

group.title: Backend/Ops
points: Nodejs, Nestjs, Express, API design and microservice architecture including JWT, middleware and other patterns.
Postgres, Sql and mongo for persistence layer
Docker in production and development including docker-compose and stack
VPS ubuntu, CentOS configuration for a hosting, including clustered nodes for hosting containers

group.title: Senior Javascript developer, Polestar space applications
points: Design the application architecture to be implemented by the team, based on modern FE web tech (redux, rxjs, flex, etc)
Implement new features, including complicated asynchronous layouts, map interactivity and animations
Implement mono repo solution for maintaining multiple applications making use of shared and reusable libraries
Refactor and clean existing code based on best practices

group.title: Javascript developer, Quidco marketing
points: Re-skin angular application with updated design and build process.
Implement new features and maintain the primary business application.
Use a team based workflow including scrum with agile development and multi branch, git flow processes.

group.title: Javascript developer, Runpath
points: Extended and maintained an Angular app to provide a UI for multiple .NET based financial services.
Built a custom LESS framework and style guide development, along with gulp node build process.

group.title: Lead frontend/Javascript developer, Hybrid marketing
points: Develop wordpress sites with customer portals, store locators, event calendars and other custom modules
Lead frontend developer on the AngularJS Thomas Farms Kitchen application

group.title: Web developer, Webedge Marketing
points: Built CRM web application suing cordova and nodejs

group.title: Velocity App
points: Built the FE architecture based on best practices and modern web tech (angular, redux, rxjs)
Design an API using NodeJS, Postgres, Express and docker
Configure CentOS, to host the application across load balanced multi node container cluster
Supporting work such as analytics, marketing, project management and more
